ng to Ketheric. (or Allow Balthazar to transport Nightsong from the Shadowfell.) The Best Offense is Virtually Nonsense: Defeat a member of the Thorm family without drawing steel.

Court Marshall: Expose the Flaming Fist deserter. Double-Tap: Kill Auntie Ethel... again... Great Helm of Legends: Find the Helm of Balduran. Hot Exit: Escape the House of Hope. Innovations in Volatility: Give your blood to Araj a second time. Kicking the Rust Bucket: Destroy a Steel Watcher. Putting the Past to Rest:
